defaultMessage: You will find here the list of the packages I authored, their description, use-case, and their state of development. Everything is distributed under the MIT license.
Production-grade, documented, code libraries for your projects.

The following packages are helper packages, for instance, templates or generators. They are simple projects I rely on to be more productive, and have at the moment little to no documentation. (This might change in the future.)
A color library for the component era, based on css4 vars and the mutator pattern.
A large component library for react, developped and documented on Storybook, used internally by most of my apps.
A template for a GraphQL / universal React application, to be deployed on Vercel, or be used as an example to build lambda-based infrastructure.
A template for an Apollo GraphQL Server running on nodejs, serving to interface Sequelize dabatase models with a public GraphQL schema.
A quick generator of functional components for React, including common PropTypes, defaultProps, internationalization and local module scss.
A quick generator of Storybook v5 stories, compatible with the docs and the PropTypes table, integrates advanced logic such as subcomponents or story decorators.
